Description: Roman red slipped rim sherd from a bowl. Light orange fabric.
Curator's comments: Roman tableware sherd in ARS fabric and thin slip on inside. Large carrinated bowl. see ARS form 11 dated 2nd century AD by Hayes (1972, 36-8, but with applied frill).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IF.127)
